channel.title: Hmm
channel.description:
Alright, well my Client won't connect to my server. It connects to numbers, like 127.0.0.0 or something like that. I need to change that, so it linked to my server IP for my Client.
I'm not sure what file to do this in. I tried the Eugi file or whatever, and changed it, but it still gives me 127.0.0.0 when going to connect.
How can I fix this, thanks in advance.

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Umm… goto Egui.java and Client.java And do ctrl+f And write the current ip and change it to yours and compile then done…

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @ledgman ledgman
item.description:
@ledgman wrote:

Be more specific in your subject name.

Also YOU the host has to connect to 127.0.0.1 and players connect to your no-ip.
So you will need 2 duplicate clients.

To change the ip.

these are the files you should edit, just search for 127.0.0.1 or your no-ip, whichever you have in that file.

Client sided - Go into client.java. Possibly EGUI.java, depends on base.
Server sided - server.java.

Read full topic
